message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more now, and we both avoid losses from inflation.
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering I'm losing value faster than you.
Bob, this is the best I can offer. It's better than what we'll both get if we wait any longer due to inflation.  Take it or leave it.
I'd rather take a bigger share now than lose even more to inflation. This is my final offer.
